title: North Carolina
prompt: A weathered county road stretching into farmland under soft morning light, with a small rural clinic or health center visible in the middle distance, its simple brick structure framed by bare trees. In the foreground, a pair of hands hold a stack of official documents or letters on a wooden surface—a kitchen table or porch railing—with the morning light casting long shadows across the papers. The composition should feel grounded and intimate while suggesting the weight of policy decisions affecting entire communities, shot in documentary style with muted greens and earth tones, conveying quiet urgency without drama.
